coauthors.name: Yvonne Alden
coauthors.bio: Nothing is known about Yvonne Alden save for their attribution on a poster featuring the earth and an earth pledge which may have circulated as an ephemeral work during National Space Week in 1994 at Brooks Air Force Base in San Antonio, Texas. If you know any more about the life and career of Yvonne Alden, please contact us.

content:
Contribute a translation Source (English)
I pledge allegiance to Planet Earth,
Mother of All Nations;
And to the Infinite Universe
In which she stands;
Our planet,
Among millions,
Expressing Truth
and Unlimited Possibilities
for all!

This earth pledge appeared on a poster attributed to one “Yvonne Alden” that was found in a collection of memorabilia from [National] Space Week 1994 at Brooks Air Force Base, in San Antonio, Texas. Space Week 1994 was a celebration of the 25th anniversary of the Apollo 11 moon landing. On the poster, the pledge appeared below an image of the planet Earth. The poster is mentioned by Jodi Dean in the introduction to her book, Aliens in America: Conspiracy Cultures from Outerspace to Cyberspace (1998), on page 20. Help locating an image of this poster, or more information on Yvonne Alden is appreciated in order to determine a more exact date and attribution for this earth pledge.
